member.name: M:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.TrxReport.Abstractions.TrxReportEngine.BuildReservedFileNameRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(?i:^(CON|PRN|AUX|NUL|COM[1-9]|LPT[1-9]|CLOCK\\$)(\\..*)?)$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match with 7 alternative expressions.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Cc].
○ Match a character in the set [Oo].
○ Match a character in the set [Nn].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Pp].
○ Match a character in the set [Rr].
○ Match a character in the set [Nn].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Aa].
○ Match a character in the set [Uu].
○ Match a character in the set [Xx].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Nn].
○ Match a character in the set [Uu].
○ Match a character in the set [Ll].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Cc].
○ Match a character in the set [Oo].
○ Match a character in the set [Mm].
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Ll].
○ Match a character in the set [Pp].
○ Match a character in the set [Tt].
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Cc].
○ Match a character in the set [Ll].
○ Match a character in the set [Oo].
○ Match a character in the set [Cc].
○ Match a character in the set [Kk\u212A].
○ Match '$'.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match '.'.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.TrxReport.Abstractions.TrxReportEngine.BuildInvalidXmlCharReplace
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[^\\x09\\x0A\\x0D\\x20-\\uD7FF\\uE000-\\uFFFD]
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [^\t\n\r -\uD7FF\uE000-\uFFFD].
